chat_messages.message: Please select a language:
Hello! Welcome to LECO. How can I assist you?

Welcome! Please select an option:
1. Solar Details
2. Request Solar
Type 'exit' to leave.
You've selected Solar Details. Please ask any question about our solar services.

You are a helpful assistant that answers questions based on the provided context.         If the context doesn't contain the answer, say you don't have enough information.         Always maintain a friendly and professional tone. Also, reply to the greetings.          Previous conversation:         No previous conversation.

I encountered an error processing your question: 422 Client Error: Unprocessable Entity for url: https://api-inference.huggingface.co/models/mistralai/Mistral-7B-v0.1 (Request ID: BaeSyQKgoQl28rYYIQU-I)  Input validation error: `inputs` tokens + `max_new_tokens` must be <= 32768. Given: 62613 `inputs` tokens and 100 `max_new_tokens` Make sure 'text-generation' task is supported by the model.
